definition: currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: After human beings accept the heavenly De, the prime energy is produced.
sentences.chinese: 人在接收天德以後產生元氣能量。

sentences.english: It of the life be all vitalities psyches that the natures living to work properly spirit.
sentences.chinese: 它的命就是所有自然生靈精神的元氣魂魄。

sentences.english: The Gulf War has sapped Iraqi vitality badly.
sentences.chinese: 海灣戰爭使伊拉克大傷元氣。

sentences.english: Their lives have been rejuvenated. Families and communities have been revived.
sentences.chinese: 他們獲得了新生，家庭和社區恢復了元氣。

sentences.english: The Gulf War has cost Iraq dearly.; Iraq has been drained of its strength by the Gulf War.; The Gulf War has sapped Iraqi vitality badly.
sentences.chinese: 海灣戰爭使伊拉克大傷元氣。

sentences.english: Three close, love mental efforts is gauntly, hurt vitality greatly, china female illegible marry a person.
sentences.chinese: 三分三合，愛得心力憔悴，大傷元氣，華女潦草嫁人。
快速從骨痛熱症恢復元氣。

sentences.english: And in My quiet strength again be strong.
sentences.chinese: 在我寧靜的力量中恢復元氣。

sentences.english: This week, a number of heavyweight has left more nail-biter was to Yahoo.
sentences.chinese: 本週，若干重量級人物先後離開，更使雅虎元氣大傷。

sentences.english: Clinical effect research of RBIQ was made on random and control standard.
sentences.chinese: 按隨機對照原則研究調補元氣法的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: This is often why people are sapped by mid-afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 這就是通常人們半下午元氣大傷的原因所在。

sentences.english: Featuring long working distance and excellent depth of field, it accommodates a wide variety of components for inspection.
sentences.chinese: 工作距離長，景深深，可檢測各種元氣件。

sentences.english: But you've taken quite a trouncing today, haven't you, Vergil?
sentences.chinese: 但你今天已經元氣大傷了，對不對，維吉爾？

sentences.english: And Japan's economy promptly fell off a cliff and has never recovered.
sentences.chinese: 結果日本經濟馬上跌下懸崖，從未恢復元氣。

sentences.english: Some species of marsupials mate with such vigour and intensity that it kills them.
sentences.chinese: 某些有袋類雄性會用致其於死地的元氣和力量去交配。

sentences.english: The financial crisis devitalized the economy of the Asian countries.
sentences.chinese: 這次金融危機使亞洲國家的經濟大傷元氣。

opportunity to live/to reprieve from death/life force/vitality

time and place/world of a particular locale and era/(physics) space-time
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
